abstract: Arab political factions in Israel announce that they have formed single ticket for elections in March for first time, response to new electoral threshold of 3.25 percent that raised possibility small parties would be excluded from Parliament; announcement comes after weeks of intense negotiations.
lead_paragraph: Facing an electoral threshold that threatens to bar small parties from Parliament, the factions are forming a single ticket for the March elections.
snippet: Facing an electoral threshold that threatens to bar small parties from Parliament, the factions are forming a single ticket for the March elections.

headline.main: Diverse Israeli Arab Political Factions Join Forces to Keep Place in Parliament
headline.print_headline: Diverse Israeli Arab Political Factions Join Forces to Keep Place in Parliament
